quoteText:
Review Tool is Yotpo’s intellectual property – not yours;
  • in respect of any reviews or other content you contribute through your use of the Review Tool, you grant Yotpo and Redbubble the perpetual right to use that content;
  • if the concept of ‘moral rights’ (or analogous rights) in relation to content applies in your country, then you agree to waive those rights, to the extent permitted by local laws
title: You sign away moral rights
